mapper.sql: SELECT ID, OD_ID, MEM_ID, MILEAGE, CONTENT, REGDATE FROM MALL_MILEAGE
mapper.insert:
SELECT mall_mileage_seq.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO MALL_MILEAGE(ID, OD_ID, MEM_ID, MILEAGE, CONTENT) VALUES(#{id}, #{order.id}, NULL, #{member.id}, #{mileage}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(sum(mileage), 0) as mileage FROM MALL_MILEAGE WHERE mem_id = #{id}
SELECT count(a.id) FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, ID, OD_ID, MEM_ID, MILEAGE, CONTENT, REGDATE FROM MALL_MILEAGE )B)A

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, B.* FROM (SELECT ID, OD_ID, MEM_ID, MILEAGE, CONTENT, REGDATE FROM MALL_MILEAGE ORDER BY id desc )B)A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY A.RNUM

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, B.* FROM (SELECT ID, OD_ID, MEM_ID, MILEAGE, CONTENT, REGDATE FROM MALL_MILEAGE
and content like '%'||#{mileage.content}||'%' and mem_id like '%'||#{mileage.member.id}||'%' )b)a WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN #{cri.rowStart} AND #{cri.rowEnd} order by a.rnum
mapper.update: update mall_mileage set od_id =#{order.id}, mem_id= #{member.id}, mileage = #{mileage} , content = #{content} where id = #{id}
